cause.description:
I regret to tell you all the sad news that i have to find homes for my two minous, Loki and Keisha...and i need your help. They are both 3 years old and are in great health..Loki is a purebread Himalayan male..he is beautiful..fun and loves to play...he's a good cuddler..and he is the cutest cat you will ever see...Keisha is a mixed female...and the MOST affectionate cat in the world..she loves to be around people and would be most happy in a home with lots of people to pet and cuddle her. She is beautiful and can cheer you up with her purring if you're ever down. She saved me with her affection. Both Keisha and Loki are neutered, and Keisha has her front claws taken out. They are both very tolerant to being groomed...It kills me to do this as i love them both very much and need to make sure that they go to good homes, so if you or anyone you know are a cat lover and feel that you could help them out, it would be infinately appreciated. I can't, and won't bring them to the SPCA, and will do what it takes to find them homes. Please forward this to all the cat loving people you know..
If you have any questions, please give me a call anytime...514 806 6644
Thanks basha
1. Loki and Keisha are the sweetest, best cats and they are looking for a good homes
cause.mission: Relocate Loki and Keisha to loving, caring homes
cause.name: Please help my minous find a good home
